net.alomax.util

Class Date2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alomax.util.Date2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimeInstant

    public class Date2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A custom Date-like class with century and day of year
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
